referencePolicyDesc.source:
The Source policy instructs clients to pull directly from the source registry of the image.
The integrated registry is not involved unless the image is managed by the cluster(It is not an external image). This is the default policy.
referencePolicyDesc.local:
The Local policy instructs clients to always pull from the integrated registry.
This is useful if you want to pull from external insecure registries without modifying Docker daemon settings.
